name: Wind-up Toy´s
description:
Wind-up Toy´s

is my entry for the Brackes Jam 2020.2, Theme was "Rewind".
Unfortunately i only get this little prototype finish but still I am satisfied that i made it and i learnd a lot by doing it.
I thought of a game were you try to hit the finishing line with a red toy car by only "rewind" the car.

Gameplay
  • you can click and drag to move the camera
  • press and hold "R" to rewind the car
    • the maximum rewinding time is limited to 9 seconds
    • you can release and preass (hold) R again
    • you cant decrease rewinded time
  • Press "Space" to let the car drive off
    • when the car drives it cant be "rewind" anymore
  • Goal is to hit the finishing line
    • you lose if the car stops before or behind it
